channel.title: Biophysics on All About Helin Henstridge
channel.description: Recent content in Biophysics on All About Helin Henstridge

item.title: Education
item.description:
Education

PhD in Earth Science - University of California, Santa Barbara

2025 - Present
Program Link

I am currently a first-year graduate student in the Earth Science department at UCSB. My research focuses on using deep learning and geophysical datasets to predict localized critical mineral deposits in the conterminous United States.

Bachelors of Science in Physics-Biophysics - University of California, San Diego

2021 - 2025
GPA: 3.615 / 4.0
Program Link

  • Minor in Mathematics
  • Coursework experience in physics, math, biology, chemistry, and other general education courses
  • Hands-on research experience in neurophysics, materials physics, and condensed physics
